term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - nuclear fusion reaction
term.title: nuclear fusion reaction

item.text: A reaction between two light nuclei resulting in the production of a nuclear species heavier than either initial nucleus.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1543 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
